title: #1527 Don't Label Things 'Misinformation', Label It 'Disagrees With Us'
itunes:title: #1527 Don't Label Things 'Misinformation', Label It 'Disagrees With Us'
description:
Dr. Drew opens the show telling Adam about his ongoing battle with and plan to surgically remove his diverticulitis.  Adam also asks Drew for an update on monoclonal antibodies and Adam observes some disturbing themes that have arisen during the rise of the Omicron variant. Adam also highlights an article from Alex Berenson and points out many of the observations he has been seeing as the pandemic unfolds.
